title: How to Set a Friend to a Favorite on Xbox One

steps.headline: Click the Start menu on the bottom left side of your screen.
steps.description: A list of programs and some apps will pop up on the screen.

steps.headline: Select the “All Apps” button at the bottom of the Start menu.
steps.description: This will load all the apps installed on your computer. They will be listed in alphabetical order.

steps.headline: Scroll down to the letter “X” and look for the Xbox app.
steps.description: The Xbox app is green with the word Xbox written in white inside it. Click it to load the app.

steps.headline: Log into your Microsoft account.
steps.description: Do this by typing in your email address and password in the provide text fields on the Xbox app screen. Remember, your password is case-sensitive.

steps.headline: View your friends.
steps.description: Look at the bottom right side of the Xbox app screen for your friends list. You will see your current favorites at the top of the list.

steps.headline: Find a friend to favorite.
steps.description: Scroll down through your list until you find the one you want to make a favorite. Once you find them, click on their name and their profile will load on the left side of the app.

steps.headline: Make the friend a favorite.
steps.description:
Check underneath their name for a series of options. You will see one that says “More”; click on it to open a drop-down menu. Click “Change Friendship” to open up your friendship options, and select “Favorite.”
Click “OK” at the bottom of the app to confirm your changes. You have successfully made one of your friends on Xbox One a favorite. Repeat with other friends that you want favorited.

steps.headline: Turn the console on to load your Xbox One dashboard.
steps.description: If you are turning your console on and not waking it up from sleeping, it may take a minute or two to load.

steps.headline: Go to the Friends tab.
steps.description: Scroll to the right until you see the “Friends” tab highlighted at the top of the screen. Below the Friends tab you will see a box that says “Friends,” and it will cycle through your friends.

steps.headline: View your friends.
steps.description: Press the A button on the friends box to open up your list of friends. Any friends that are currently set as a favorite will appear at the top of the screen.

steps.headline: Find the friend that you want to make a favorite.
steps.description: Your friends list goes in order by who is online and who is offline. They are both broken down alphabetically.

steps.headline: Use the A button to pick the friend that you want to make a favorite.
steps.description: Their Bio will open up on your screen as well as any activity that they might have taken part in recently.

steps.headline: Select “Change Friendship.” Press A on this box to open up the friendship options for that person.
Favorite the friend.
steps.description: Move your cursor over the bubble next to the option that says “Favorite” and hit the A button. Once done, go down to the “OK” button below the Favorite bubble, and hit the A button. You have saved your changes and made your friend a favorite.

text:
Using a Windows 10 Computer Click the Start menu on the bottom left side of your screen. A list of programs and some apps will pop up on the screen. Select the “All Apps” button at the bottom of the Start menu. This will load all the apps installed on your computer. They will be listed in alphabetical order. Scroll down to the letter “X” and look for the Xbox app. The Xbox app is green with the word Xbox written in white inside it. Click it to load the app. Log into your Microsoft account. Do this by typing in your email address and password in the provide text fields on the Xbox app screen. Remember, your password is case-sensitive. View your friends. Look at the bottom right side of the Xbox app screen for your friends list. You will see your current favorites at the top of the list. Find a friend to favorite. Scroll down through your list until you find the one you want to make a favorite. Once you find them, click on their name and their profile will load on the left side of the app. Make the friend a favorite. Check underneath their name for a series of options. You will see one that says “More”; click on it to open a drop-down menu. Click “Change Friendship” to open up your friendship options, and select “Favorite.”
Click “OK” at the bottom of the app to confirm your changes. You have successfully made one of your friends on Xbox One a favorite. Repeat with other friends that you want favorited. Using the Xbox One Console Turn the console on to load your Xbox One dashboard. If you are turning your console on and not waking it up from sleeping, it may take a minute or two to load. Go to the Friends tab. Scroll to the right until you see the “Friends” tab highlighted at the top of the screen. Below the Friends tab you will see a box that says “Friends,” and it will cycle through your friends. View your friends. Press the A button on the friends box to open up your list of friends. Any friends that are currently set as a favorite will appear at the top of the screen. Find the friend that you want to make a favorite. Your friends list goes in order by who is online and who is offline. They are both broken down alphabetically. Use the A button to pick the friend that you want to make a favorite. Their Bio will open up on your screen as well as any activity that they might have taken part in recently. Select “Change Friendship.” Press A on this box to open up the friendship options for that person.  Favorite the friend. Move your cursor over the bubble next to the option that says “Favorite” and hit the A button. Once done, go down to the “OK” button below the Favorite bubble, and hit the A button. You have saved your changes and made your friend a favorite.
